footer.author: Chuck Robert
footer.sentence: Add color to life and make dreams vibrant

search.engine_saved: Search engine modification successful, current search engine { name }

enter.wallhaven: Enter keywords to search for Wallhaven wallpapers

setting.autoCleanInputDescription: Clear the search box content when the search box is out of focus
setting.autoFocusDescription: Automatically focus at the beginning of the page
setting.closeCoverDescription: When turned on, a dark mask will be added to the background

colorPage_text.default: Set the built-in color as the theme color. The first color is the main color, the second is the mouse hover font color, and the third is the hover background color.
colorPage_text.default_2: If the main color does not meet your aesthetic, you can first click on the pre-selected color below, and then customize your favorite main color that is similar to the pre-selected color above.
colorPage_text.label: Choose your favorite color, this color will be the main color

setting.darkModeDescription: Turn on dark eye protection mode
setting.disableAutoGoDescription: Donâ€™t jump when clicking the search prompt
setting.dynamicDescription: When turned on, the start page will have dynamic effects
setting.minimalModeDescription: When turned on, all decorative elements will be removed

msg.imgSize: We only support images, and the images after compression are smaller than
msg.imgTooLarge: The image is too large, we only allow images that are compressed to { limit }, but yours is { size } MB
msg.onlyVideo: We only support image type files
msg.video: We only support uploading video type files

setting.airCopyDescription: When logging in, it prompts to extract content from the air.
